pci_notebooks_stop_notebook_error: An error has occurred stopping the {{notebook}} notebook: {{message}}
pci_notebooks_stop_notebook_content_1: When you stop an AI Notebook:
pci_notebooks_stop_notebook_content_list: Computing resources are freed up (you no longer pay for CPUs and GPUs).
We back up your workspace (folder/workspace) securely ({{freeStorage}} free of charge, then if you exceed this quota, it is charged at the cost of Object Storage).
Everything on temporary local storage will be lost.
pci_notebooks_stop_notebook_content_2: Once it has been stopped, you can either delete your AI Notebook or restart it.
pci_notebooks_stop_notebook_content_3: We'll restore your workspace and reallocate computing resources.
